title: Expressions used with a newspaper agent
context: Ask to cancel or pause your newspaper delivery service.

content.bestLine: I'd like to cancel my newspaper subscription

neutral.text: Can I stop my newspaper delivery?
I want to cancel my newspaper service
How do I pause my newspaper subscription?
I'd like to discontinue my newspaper delivery
Can you cancel my newspaper account?
I need to stop my newspaper subscription temporarily
How can I cancel my newspaper delivery service?

informal.text: Hey, can you stop sending me the paper?
I'm done with the newspaper, can I cancel?
Can you just pause my newspaper for now?
I don't want the newspaper anymore, thanks
Can I get a refund if I cancel my newspaper?
I'm moving, can I stop my newspaper delivery?

formal.text: I would like to formally request cancellation of my newspaper subscription
Please terminate my newspaper delivery service
I am writing to cancel my newspaper account, effective immediately
Could you please assist me in canceling my newspaper subscription?

patterns.template: I want to [options] my newspaper delivery
patterns.meaning: requesting cancellation or pause of newspaper delivery
asking about cancellation or pause of newspaper subscription

dialogs.description: Customer requesting cancellation of newspaper delivery

lines.speaker: Customer
lines.text: Hi, I'd like to cancel my newspaper subscription

lines.speaker: Agent
lines.text: Okay, I can assist you with that. Can you please provide me with your account information?

dialogs.description: Customer inquiring about pausing newspaper delivery

lines.speaker: Customer
lines.text: Hi, I'm going out of town for a few weeks and I was wondering if I can pause my newspaper delivery

lines.speaker: Agent
lines.text: Yes, we can definitely pause your delivery. Would you like to specify the dates you'll be away?
